title: Its been over a week, Riot, yet the servers are still lagging.
body: We have all(save the ragers) been patient Riot, but it has been over a week now and your servers have seen no improvement as far as the connection issues go.  I assure you that I am not the only one disappointed by this seeming lack of concern on your part.  There are many, like myself, that look forward to relaxing with a few good plays and fun games at the end of a hard day of work.  And if I am so bothered by this I would hate to think how competitive players are feeling about these problems.  In, unexaggeratedly, every game I have played over the past week someone has DC'd, albeit most temporarily.  That in addition to 2k ping causing my champ to look like a wild Frogger on the Rift makes the game purely frustrating and unenjoyable.  I hope you find a way to fix it soon Riot, you've not let us down yet.  Don't start now.

Hello CelMySoulForYou,

First, I want to thank you for coming to the Boards and the new Help and Support Community.  That being said, lets dig into your issue a bit.

It is true that the NA servers have been going through some rough times in the past couple of weeks and months.  We have had server issues that made connecting to games extremely difficult.  However, these are isolated incidents and not a result of the NA servers themselves being inherently unstable.  Once we identify and quickly resolve these issues, we do not see serverwide issues with lag and disconnection issues.  

To that end, if you are experiencing issues connecting to games or experiencing extreme 2k ping spikes day to day, and from game to game, it seems that the root cause to this issue might lie somewhere else.  I am by no means claiming the issue is 100% on your end, but we do need to start ruling out root causes so that we can identify where the root cause is.  Because of this, I strongly recommend that you complete all of the steps in the following guide:

https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/26932010-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues

They resolve the majority of connection issues and will allow us to rule out multiple different causes.  If you are still consistently getting these issues, make sure to [send us over a new request](https://support.leagueoflegends.com/anonymous_requests/new) and include the logs at the bottom of this post.  These logs will allow our Tech Specialists to analyze your network, confirm if there are any issues there, and continue investigating. 

1) Network Analysis: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq1

2) NetworkInfo Log: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq4

3) Process List: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq3 

I hope this helps!
